products.name: Velcro
products.tagline: Multi-currency fintech engine for instant payments
products.description: A multi-currency fintech platform offering instant payments, bill settlements, cards, and a WhatsApp bot that lets users transact directly inside chats.
tech_highlights: WhatsApp bot integration for frictionless payments

products.name: BitNova
products.tagline: Crypto-first P2P and payment automation platform
products.description: A crypto-first P2P and payment automation platform supporting receive/send crypto via link, bill payments, airtime/data, and cash-to-crypto solutions.

products.name: Stakepadi
products.description: A Web3-powered prediction market where users predict real-world events using USDC, stablecoins, and fiat payments. Bridges traditional audiences with Web3 through safe, transparent, trustless predictions.
key_features: Fiat payment support for non-crypto users
Multi-category predictions (sports, elections, markets, pop culture)

products.name: Tsara
products.description: A hybrid settlement and compliance infrastructure for both fiat and crypto. Provides fiat-to-crypto settlement rails, merchant payout infrastructure, on-chain and off-chain compliance, secure KYC/KYB pipelines, and risk monitoring for fintechs.
tech_highlights: Backbone layer for P2P and enterprise flows

products.name: Criptpay
products.description: A crypto payment gateway enabling online and offline merchants to accept USDT, USDC, BTC, and SOL effortlessly via API, payment links, or QR codes.
key_features: Accept USDT, USDC, BTC, and SOL
QR code payments for offline merchants
